name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebSnap - Web scrolling screenshot and editor

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly capture screenshots, scroll through long pages, and edit images on the fly with our easy-to-use Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take Your Web Screenshots to the Next Level

This Chrome extension is your all-in-one solution for capturing and editing website screenshots with ease. Whether you need to capture a small section of a page, the visible screen, or an entire scrolling webpage, this tool has you covered.

Key Features:
Flexible Screenshot Options:
Select specific areas to capture.
Take full-page screenshots of scrolling websites.
Capture the visible area of a webpage instantly.
Powerful Editing Tools:
Annotate your screenshots with circles, rectangles, or freehand drawing.
Add custom text with adjustable fonts and colors.
Use the pen tool for precision drawing or mark-ups.
Apply mosaics to blur sensitive areas.
Add watermarks to personalize or protect your images.
Export Made Easy:
Save your screenshots in PNG, JPEG, or PDF format.
Customize image quality settings to balance resolution and file size.
This extension is designed to make capturing and editing web content fast, intuitive, and professional. Perfect for work, study, or creative projects, it gives you all the tools you need to share or save your ideas with style.

Download now and make screenshot capturing more powerful than ever!
